sense.name: greeting
sense.commentary: The type of greeting that people exchange upon meeting, or the reception that someone is given.
sense.examples: Let's give a warm welcome to our guest. Shaking hands isn't much of a welcome for your little brother. Some workplaces in the area extended a welcome to out-of-state employees.

sense.name: state of being welcome
sense.commentary: A quality that a person can have; the state of being wanted or tolerated in a place.
sense.examples: Don't outstay your welcome. I felt my welcome wearing a bit thin after a few days.
